title: Holiday with the Mystery Italian
description: Winning the ultimate prize...Since the accident that paralyzed him, Italian tycoon Mauro Evans vowed to embrace life. So when he stars in a dating show for charity, picking prickly journalist Amber Harris as the winner to take on holiday is a challenge he can't resist!In Amber's experience, relationships equal pain, so she s determined to ignore her attraction to charismatic Mauro. But his bravery and strength threaten to tear down her defenses, giving her a new Christmas dream--ringing in the New Year with wedding bells!
author: Ellie Darkins
